<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necromantic Deflection](/Feats.aspx?ID=3641) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 85</row>

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

You imbue your shield with life-giving energy to deflect harmful necromantic magic. When you have your shield raised, you gain the shield's circumstance bonus to your AC and saving throws against [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spells. If you have the [Shield Block](/Actions.aspx?ID=1140) reaction, damage you take as a result of a necromancy spell can trigger that reaction, even if it isn't physical damage.
